analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CryptoSlotsGame.getProfit (/unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol#159-179):
	External calls:
	- tokenBalance = token.balanceOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol#162-163)
	- profit = tokenBalance / token.totalSupply() * lastInvestorsProfitSum (/unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol#164-165)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(profit) (/unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol#166)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investorToProfitDay (/unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol#169-173)
	- lastInvestorsProfit (/unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol#167-168)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol#137-141:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.14 (/unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_winOdds' of CryptoSlotsGame.changeWinConfig (/unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol#84-85) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_winChance' of CryptoSlotsGame.changeWinConfig (/unique_chucks/27/0x934e65cead3c1c2824ed75d54768d53fa44e4e17.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
